text: Nordisk Vinternatt is a 2005 folk/traditional album by Norwegian singer Sissel Kyrkjebø released in Scandinavia. This album includes folk- and traditional songs in Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Icelandic. ==Track listing== # Denti, du Astri (Norwegian) # Vårvinder friska (Swedish) # O tysta ensamhet (Swedish) # Det er ingenting i verden så stille som sne (Danish) # Om kvelden (Norwegian) # Du är den ende (Swedish) # Jeg lagde meg så silde (Norwegian) # Bereden väg för Herran (Swedish) # Musens sang (Danish) # Den första gång jag såg dig (Swedish) # Bruremarsj (Norwegian) # Koppången (Swedish) # Sofðu ungá astín min (Icelandic) == Critical reception == Norwegian newspaper Vårt Land wrote: "Sissel sings better and better. She has found beautiful melodies from Nordic songbooks and sings them with a call that is no longer dominated by her glorious extroversion".http://www.vl.no/2.623/l%C3%B8dig-klang-fra- kyrkjeb%C3%B8-1.58056 == References == Category:Sissel Kyrkjebø albums Category:2005 albums
title: Nordisk Vinternatt
